name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Truuther - Crystallise, Comprehend and Contextualise Any Topic

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access key claims, related readings, fact-checks, crowd-sourced evidence, social media viewpoints, AI outcomes, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Truuther Chrome Extension quickly summarises key claims, offers related readings, provides fact-checked and crowd-sourced evidence, social media viewpoints, AI outcomes, and encourages user collaboration in content verification.

💻 Compatible only with laptops/desktops.

🔥 Benefits:
• Gain a deep understanding on a topic in minutes
• Combat misinformation with verified content
• Automate your research workflow from one easy to use interface

💪 The Key Features:

👉 Crystallise key claims
• Quickly understand the key claims, summarised from the content
• Deepen your knowledge on the claims by accessing related reads from general and scholastic knowledge bases
• Understand the results in your preferred language

👉 Contextualise with diverse viewpoints
• Consider publication authorship
• Consider 3rd party fact check outcomes
• Consider evidence gathered from our community of users
• Consider viewpoints gathered from social media platforms

👉 Collaborate on accuracy
• Provide evidence to support/refute claims
• Rate and share evidence to improve verification accuracy
• Flag inappropriate content
• Invite others to join the platform

🖥️ How to use:
🔸 Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
🔸 Log in to your account.
🔸 Navigate to any online content
🔸 Activate the Truuther Chrome Extension.

❓Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 What content is supported by the Truuther Extension for analysis?
Currently, we support any online article and YouTube videos.

📌 How accurate is the AI analysis for the content or claims?
The trustworthiness rating is generated by AI based on a search for matching claims in other online sources found by Truuther.  The outcome may sometimes be inaccurate - always verify the information yourself. You are fully responsible for verifying it before using it. If you disagree with the AI analysis outcome, provide your own evidence/context to correct the AI analysis via the extension.

📌 Is it free to use?
Yes, we offer limited use for free. You can unlock up to 10 online content analyses every month. For heavier usage, you can choose the Basic or Premium Plan.

📌 Which devices is the Truuther Chrome Extension compatible with?
The Truuther Chrome Extension is currently compatible with desktop and laptop devices. However, a mobile version is coming soon.

📌 What languages is the Truuther Chrome Extension available in?
The Truuther Chrome Extension's built-in translator supports over 20 languages, allowing you to translate the analysis information into your preferred language.

📫 Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at 💌 support@truuther.com.
Try it now and experience the powerful features of Truuther.
